reviews.review: The movie has everything. Good humour, emotion, action and heart felt moments. Another home run by the MCU

Avenger Infinity War is probably the most anticipated film for a lot of movie fans, it's directed by the Russo brothers who directed Winter Solider and Civil War, and stars pretty much everyone in the Marvel Cinematic Universe.
The plot for Infinity War is straightforward, you got the mad Titan himself Thanos who's on a quest to assemble all the Infinity Stones, so he can bring balance to the universe; unfortunately, in his opinion the only way to bring about a balanced universe is by wiping out half the life in the universe.
Now clearly the concept of having half the life in the universe wiped out does not sit well with the Avengers, or with the Guardians of the Galaxy or any of our other MCU heroes and they have to band together to stop Thanos before he can succeed.
This film packs emotional punch that has been ten years in the making and boy does it absolutely deliver, this film is an incredible journey that takes you all around the galaxy with some fantastic visuals, non-stop action even in the quieter scenes and a gut-wrenching story.
The stakes couldn't be higher here and Thanos is fully realized, he's the most important character in this movie, this really is his movie. Beyond that Thanos is without question the best villain the MCU has ever had.
Everyone gets a chance to shine which says something incredible about the Russo brothers as filmmakers and that ending will break you.
This really does feel like a worthy culmination of all the MCU movies we've seen thus far, it's the history of the characters, the relationships they have with each other, what they stand for, it all comes together and lets the movie just knock the wind out of you.
Stellar performances combined with a frighteningly logical villain. This movie leaves you emotionally exhausted after your favorite heroes go toe to toe with the Mad Titan.

Marvel's infinity war is a explosive packed movie with overwhelming action, enthralling storyline, which ends with a bang.
A perfect holiday combo for marvel fans and others too.
10 years in the making and itâ€™s simply phenomenal.

It was an amazing movie. If you are like me and have been a fan of Marvel and the MCU for years you will definitely enjoy and appreciate the nearly perfectly crafted art work the Russo brothers have put together. For a film on this scale with this many big names/ faces in it they did an incredible job to make sure almost every character has their moment to shine and at the same time have some of the most shocking moments ever in a SUPERHERO MOVIE! It is a A MUST SEE FOR FANS!! 

Also Thanos is the BEST Villain to hit the MCU hands down his story arch made you empathize with him & hate him at the same time
O man. So good. Almost perfect. Cant really see how they could have made this crazy idea any better. A great achievement. Almost the perfect blockbuster! Deserves way more hype than black panther.
Thanos is the greatest villain of the MCU as well as one of the greatest of all time.
